amendment.description: Amendment no. 43 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the African Development Bank by $3 million and increase the limitation on callable capital subscriptions.

action.text: Mr. Callahan raised a point of order against the Jackson (IL) amendment (A014). Mr. Callahan stated that the amendment increased new discretionary budget authority and violated Sec. 302f of the Congressional Budget Act. The Chair sustained the point of order.
